name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your favorite apps in a sidebar - TabBuddy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access your favorite apps (ChatGPT, Reddit, YouTube and many more) instantly from a convenient sidebar on any tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabBuddy brings your favorite apps right to your fingertips with a handy sidebar accessible from any tab. Whether you're chatting with ChatGPT, browsing Reddit, or watching YouTube, TabBuddy makes multitasking a breeze. Choose from a list of popular apps or add your own custom apps to the sidebar. Boost your productivity and streamline your browsing experience with TabBuddy!

📌 Open Apps in a Sidebar: Use your favorite apps without leaving your current tab.
🔍 Choose from Popular Apps: Select from a wide variety of popular apps available in TabBuddy.
✨ Create Custom Apps: Add any app you want by creating a custom entry.
🌐 Available on Every Tab: Enjoy seamless access to the sidebar on every tab you open.

 Here are some of the apps you can access directly from the TabBuddy sidebar:

ChatGPT – AI-driven conversations and problem-solving at your fingertips.
YouTube Music – Enjoy your favorite tunes while staying productive.
Telegram – Keep in touch with friends and communities effortlessly.
YouTube – Watch videos, learn, and be entertained in just one click.
Reddit – Dive into discussions, news, and trends across countless topics.
Todoist – Organize your tasks and boost your productivity.
Bing – Explore the web and find what you need with ease.
Gemini – Stay on top of your finances with Google Gemini.
Microsoft Copilot – AI-powered productivity for your workflow.
LinkedIn – Connect with professionals and grow your network.
Trello – Manage projects and collaborate seamlessly.
Twitter (X) – Stay updated with what's trending in real time.
Facebook – Engage with your community and friends.
Instagram – Share moments and explore creativity.
Pinterest – Get inspired with ideas and designs.
Google Search – Find answers, information, and everything else.
WhatsApp – Stay connected through messages, calls, and more.
Canva – Design stunning visuals for work and social media.
Figma – Collaborate on design projects in real time.
GitHub – Manage and collaborate on coding projects.
Dropbox – Store and share files securely.
Notion – Organize your notes, projects, and tasks.
Spotify – Listen to your favorite music as you work.
Perplexity – Dive into AI-powered search and knowledge.

With TabBuddy, everything you need is just a click away. Start exploring and streamline your workflow today!
